entry.title: Newsletter #119
entry.content:

2015 is almost over and it was a great tech year here at Namshi, can’t wait for 2016!

entry.title: Newsletter #116
entry.content:
Hi folks!

Yet another photo of Alex, Cirpo and Oba from DockerCon Europe 2015.

Also, we celebrated Prabeesh’s birthday by giving Lucio as a birthday present; not sure if he liked it but he seemed happy.

Below you can find the usual list of interesting articles we discovered in the past 7 days.

  • 8 tips about overcoming impostor syndrom

  • one-click deploy for service oriented architectures – kate heddleston (software engineer) – youtube

  • support for older versions of internet explorer ends on january 12, 2016

  • the craft of collaboration

entry.title: Newsletter #115
entry.content:
Hi folks!

Alex and Oba are back from DockerCon Europe 2015. Looks like Oba and Cirpo had fun at DockerCon.
